English
This major motion picture event -- an experience created to be shared among
families and communities across the U.S. -- brings the story of Jesus' life to
audiences through compelling cinematic storytelling that is both powerful and
inspirational. Told with the scope and scale of an action epic, the film features
powerful performances, exotic locales, dazzling visual effects and a rich
orchestral score from Oscar (R)-winner Hans Zimmer. Portuguese actor Diogo Morgado
portrays the role of Jesus as the film spans from his humble birth through his
teachings, crucifixion and ultimate resurrection
